name: Trains on Time
description:
Trains on Time!
Missed your train again? Practice your train timing skills in this new, fun, and exciting game. You need precision, you need planning, and you need dexterity to perfectly time these trains.
Feel your heart beat faster as the trains start rolling at exactly the right time! It’s nerve-racking and exhilarating all at once!

Got a ticket? Don’t worry, Trains on Time is completely free. Unlocking different colors of the trains, and new features, is all down to your skill, not what you’re willing to pay. So start practicing your train timing skills now!

Get down to the platform and start playing Trains on Time this instant! Choo-choo, don’t miss the train!
